body.raw:
<?xml version = "1.0"?>
<Kronos_WFC version = "1.0">
    <Request
        Object = "System"
        Action = "Logon"
        UserName = "{{kronos_username}}"
        Password = "{{kronos_pwd}}"
    />
    <Request Action='Load'>
        <Timesheet>
            <Employee>
                <PersonIdentity PersonNumber = "21075864"/>
            </Employee>
            <Period>
                <TimeFramePeriod PeriodDateSpan = '11/02/2023 - 11/02/2023' />
            </Period>
        </Timesheet>
    </Request>
    <Request Object="System" Action="Logoff" />
</Kronos_WFC>

<?xml version = "1.0"?>
<Kronos_WFC version = "1.0">
    <Request
        Object = "System"
        Action = "Logon"
        UserName = "{{kronos_username}}"
        Password = "{{kronos_pwd}}"
    />
    <Request Object = "ServerTime" Action = "GetServerTime"/>
    <Request Object="System" Action="Logoff" />
</Kronos_WFC>

<?xml version = "1.0"?>
<Kronos_WFC version = "1.0">
    <Request
        Object = "System"
        Action = "Logon"
        UserName = "{{kronos_username}}"
        Password = "{{kronos_pwd}}"
    />
    <Request Action='Load'>
        <WTKEmployee>
            <Identity>
                <PersonIdentity PersonNumber = "21075864"/>
            </Identity>
        </WTKEmployee>
    </Request>
    <Request Object="System" Action="Logoff" />
</Kronos_WFC>

<?xml version = "1.0"?>
<Kronos_WFC version = "1.0">
    <Request
        Object = "System"
        Action = "Logon"
        UserName = "{{kronos_username}}"
        Password = "{{kronos_pwd}}"
    />
    <Request Action='LoadIdentities'>
        <PersonIdentity PersonNumber = "21075864"/>
    </Request>
    <Request Object="System" Action="Logoff" />
</Kronos_WFC>

<?xml version = "1.0"?>
<Kronos_WFC version = "1.0">
    <Request
        Object = "System"
        Action = "Logon"
        UserName = "{{kronos_username}}"
        Password = "{{kronos_pwd}}"
    />
    <Request Action='RunQuery'>
        <HyperFindQuery
            HyperFindQueryName = "All Home" 
            QueryIncludeWTKEmployeeFlag = "false"
            QueryIncludePersonFlag = "true"
            QueryIncludeUserFlag = "true"
            QueryDateSpan = "10/29/2023 - 11/07/2023"
            VisibilityCode = "Public"
        >
        </HyperFindQuery>
    </Request>
    <Request Object="System" Action="Logoff" />
</Kronos_WFC>

<?xml version = "1.0"?>
<Kronos_WFC version = "1.0">
    <Request
        Object = "System"
        Action = "Logon"
        UserName = "{{kronos_username}}"
        Password = "{{kronos_pwd}}"
    />
    <Request Action="AddOnly" EchoData = "true">
        <PayCodeEdit
            StartTime = "3:00PM"
            AmountInTimeOrCurrency = "3.00"
            Date = "09/30/2023"
            PayCodeName = "Doubletime"
        >
            <Employee>
                <CurrentUser />
            </Employee>
        </PayCodeEdit>
    </Request>
    <Request Object="System" Action="Logoff" />
</Kronos_WFC>

<?xml version = "1.0"?>
<Kronos_WFC version = "1.0">
    <Request
        Object = "System"
        Action = "Logon"
        UserName = "{{kronos_username}}"
        Password = "{{kronos_pwd}}"
    />
    <Request Action="AddOnly" EchoData = "true">
        <Punch Time = "9:00 AM" Date = "11/03/2023" CommentText = "Misc-General">
            <Notes>
                <Note Text="SoftWrench2 WO Num: 30240" />
            </Notes>
            <Employee>
                <PersonIdentity PersonNumber = "21075864"/>
            </Employee>
        </Punch>
        <Punch Time = "5:00 PM" Date = "11/03/2023" CommentText = "Misc-General">
            <Notes>
                <Note Text="SoftWrench2 WO Num: 30240" />
            </Notes>
            <Employee>
                <PersonIdentity PersonNumber = "21075864"/>
            </Employee>
        </Punch>
    </Request>
    <Request Object="System" Action="Logoff" />
</Kronos_WFC>

<?xml version = "1.0"?>
<Kronos_WFC version = "1.0">
    <Request
        Object = "System"
        Action = "Logon"
        UserName = "{{kronos_username}}"
        Password = "{{kronos_pwd}}"
    />
    <Request Action="LoadAllPayCodes">
        <PayCode />
    </Request>
    <Request Object="System" Action="Logoff" />
</Kronos_WFC>

<?xml version = "1.0"?>
<Kronos_WFC version = "1.0">
    <Request
        Object = "System"
        Action = "Logon"
        UserName = "{{kronos_username}}"
        Password = "{{kronos_pwd}}"
    />
    <Request Action="LoadActiveComments">
        <Comment />
    </Request>
    <Request Object="System" Action="Logoff" />
</Kronos_WFC>
